overview: A collection of video clips and behind the scenes footage tracing the history of Swedish AOR rockers Bad Habit, from their formation in 1987 through to 2009.  1		Need Somebody 2		More Than a Feeling 3		Never Find Another You 4		Rainbow 5		Another Night 6		Alive 7		Walk Of Life 8		I Don't Want you 9		Above And Beyond
title: Bad Habit Ultimate Collection 1987 - 2009
